name: Cold Mayhem
description:
This is a story about one Penguin and one Yeti, both leaders of lands across the northern plains. After a disagreement on land that was once owned by another clan, they have chosen for a battle to the death for the rights of the land. Who will survive?

Cold Mayhem is a wild game of “Hit and Run” tactics and cold PVE. The player throws snowballs against an artificial intelligence to make them cold. Once a player’s health bar depletes, they will freeze, shatter, and respawn until either one of the character’s lives are all gone. The game provides obstacles for the user to hide behind and evade the enemy before they are hit by the snowball.

Controls for the characters are as followed:

W: Forward, A: Left, S: Down, D: Right, Space: Jump, L-Shift: Sprint

Mouse: Look Around, LMB Hold: Charge Throw, LMB Release: Throw

This is a game made by students, any comments or criticism is appreciated!
